name: WHEEL OF MAYHEM || Brackeys Jam 2021.2
description:
The TV Show where anything goes!

Spin the wheel and enter the arena, how long can you last?

CONTROLS:

WASD and Mouse - Move and Aim

R - Reload

Space - Dash

IN THE FIRST SCENE YOUR CHARACTER IS ON THE BOTTOM LEFT, OUT OF VIEW

Most people don't realize you must walk to the wheel to spin it. My bad. 

You win after killing 50 enemies

Big thanks to quaternius for his excelent free assets.

https://quaternius.itch.io/

All other assets from Unity assetstore.
